article_title: The Morning Download: Apple Wages Watershed Privacy Battle with Government
article_text:
Piero Cruciatti/Zuma Press

Resisting a government order to help unlock an iPhone used by one of the San Bernardino attackers, Apple described the legal battle with the FBI and a federal court as an unprecedented contest that will help establish the boundaries of privacy and government power.
